caption: Figure 3: Progressive validation accuracy of Llama-3-Instruct on MetaMath. Figure 4: Progressive validation accuracy of Phi-3-Medium on MetaMath.
description: The charts display the progressive validation accuracy of the Flow model with and without online DPO training, compared to the zero-shot performance of a single LLM, across different numbers of training samples for Llama-3-Instruct and Phi-3-Medium models on the MetaMath dataset.
